short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide and mute videos from specific YouTube channels.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay away from unwanted YouTube channels!

Have you ever encountered an unwanted videos from some channels, even after clicking "Do not recommend this channel"?

It's just a few click away from staying away from those channels, with this extension.
